5d2d1474-47be-4822-a6ec-23a33037e11c.name: 视力不良（远视）
5d2d1474-47be-4822-a6ec-23a33037e11c.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

ec1655a2-b501-4b44-a045-74a5a60056bf.name: 视力不良（近视）
ec1655a2-b501-4b44-a045-74a5a60056bf.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks
